creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
Record the readings of electricity meters, water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if the electricity consumption increases or decreases. This is EHW+.

Functions:
- Store all meters in the app (no limit to the number)
- Enter counter readings (currently without limitation of the number*)
- Assign a room to a counter (optional)
- Store the price per unit for meter types to get a cost overview (optional)
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)
- Currently free of advertising*.

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* In the future, it could be that we will display advertising after a certain number of recorded meter readings before the first entry.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. That's good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the readings of electricity meters, water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if the electricity consumption increases or decreases. This is EHW+.

Functions:
- Store all meters in the app (no limit to the number)
- Enter counter readings (currently without limitation of the number*)
- Assign a room to a counter (optional)
- Store the price per unit for meter types to get a cost overview (optional)
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)
- Currently free of advertising*.

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* In the future, it could be that we will display advertising after a certain number of recorded meter readings before the first entry.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
descriptionShort: Meter reading & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW: Meter readings of objects can now also be synchronized across multiple devices by multiple people (with Google Drive). An automatic sync is optionally performed on app startup.

IMPROVEMENT:
* In Excel export, liters instead of cubic meters.

FIXES:
* Meter reading chart now shows actual readings and does not convert (for gas meters or water meters).
* Water distance meters are no longer deleted after restart. Thanks for reporting!

title: EHW+ | Consumption & meter readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Basic functions (free of charge):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purachse
descriptionShort: Meter reading & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This version may still contain bugs and comes without visible changes. In the background, the framework for in-app purchases has been updated as required by Google.

title: EHW+ | Consumption & meter readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Basic functions (free of charge):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purachse
descriptionShort: Meter reading & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Google has changed the ways you can access your Google Drive. The app now needs fewer permissions for Google Drive Sync than before.

Corrections:
* The app can now be found in the PlayStore again for tablets without an LED light or camera. Turning the torch on and off is optional.

title: EHW+ | Consumption & readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase
descriptionShort: Meter readings & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: EHW+ | Consumption & readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase

title: EHW+ | Consumption & readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase
descriptionShort: Meter readings & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEU:
* CSV-Export (Premium)

VERBESSERUNGEN:
* Löschen von Objekten auch ohne Premium möglich
* Neue Stadtwerke: EWV, enwor

KORREKTUREN:
* Neu angelegter Zähler nach CSV-Import direkt sichtbar
* Fix für Gaszähler mit Ableseeinheit kWh
* Einheitenwechsel für Heizkörper/Fernwärme-Zähler ändert nicht die Einheit der anderen Zähler

The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase
descriptionShort: Meter readings & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW:
* Meter reading chart can be hidden via meter settings
* Precipitation water fee can be stored (Premium)

IMPROVEMENTS:
* Icon for "charge e-car" activity
* Estimate in meter reading updates on date change
* Export note to CSV file, import column 3 as note

CORRECTIONS:
* Forecast on <3 months of readings.
* No crash when period selection is cancelled in meter reading chart.
* Parse only JSON files when doing drive sync
* Loading behavior of in-app purchases

title: EHW+ | Consumption & readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase
descriptionShort: Meter readings & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: By frequent request, the costs per day are visible again in the meter reading overview page, in addition to the costs for the period between readings. In addition, a query for the data protection settings appears when the app is started for the first time.

title: EHW+ | Consumption & readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase
descriptionShort: Meter readings & evaluation for electricity, heating and water

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEU:
* Bei der wöchentlichen Erinerung kann jeder Wochentag ausgewählt werden
* Einheit cm für Ölzähler

VERBESSERUNGEN:
* Zeige Datum an, wann Zählerstand veraltet ist und Zeitpunkt nächster Erinnerung
* Hintergrund-Foto-Löschen-Button deutlich auffälliger, mit Schrift
* Ölzähler rechnet nicht automatisch in m3 um ab 1000 Litern

KORREKTUREN:
* Vor Sync sollte ein Internet-Check erfolgen

title: EHW+ | Consumption & readings

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase

EHW+ | Consumption & readings
1.12.15

creator: Digitown
descriptionHtml:
The free app EHW+ makes it possible to find out about one's own consumption of electricity, heating and water in order to better assess and regulate it. This is good for your wallet and good for the climate.

Record the meter readings of electricity meters (also HT/NT meters), water meters (hot water, cold water), radiators, oil heaters and gas meters and get an overview of consumption and its costs. Find out which room is heated the most. How much does it cost to fill a bathtub? See if electricity consumption is increasing or decreasing. This is EHW+.

Core functionality (free):
- Store all meters in the app
- Enter as many meter readings as you like
- Assign a room to a meter if it only measures consumption in one room (e.g. two water meters for the bathroom only).
- Enter the price per unit for contracts to get an overview of the costs.
- Use the app in dark mode (optional)

Import/export/sync functions:
- Save your meter readings as JSON file (suitable for import)
- Import existing meter readings via CSV file
- Export all your meter readings as an Excel file*.
- Synchronise all your objects with Google Drive (optional)

Other:
- Support of water extraction meters*
- Manage as many residential units as you like*

Feedback:
- The app was only developed in December 2020. Feedback on the app is highly welcome.

* InApp purchase
